      • testRewriteHttpsOnly

        public void testRewriteHttpsOnly()
                          throws Exception
        rewriteHttpsOnly property is used to limit URL rewrite to HTTPS ones (intended for proxy mode). That should affect how StringTransformer picks up URLs in text for translation.

        Now rewriteHttpsOnly has no effect on JSStringTransformer's behavior and picks up all fulll URLs.

        Throws:
        Exception

      • testRewriteHttpsOnlyEscapedSlashes

        public void testRewriteHttpsOnlyEscapedSlashes()
                                        throws Exception
        same as above, slashes are backslash-escaped.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testRewriteProtocolRelativeWithCustomRegex

        public void testRewriteProtocolRelativeWithCustomRegex()
                                                throws Exception
        test of rewriting protocol relative URLs ("//www.example.com/...") with non-default regex.

        check if text preceding the first group is preserved in the result. also make sure it works with URLs with protocol.

        Throws:
        Exception

      • testRewriteSpecialCharURL

        public void testRewriteSpecialCharURL()
                               throws Exception
        test of rewriting corner case where URL contains special chars for Matcher#appendReplacement.
        Throws:
        Exception
